name: Simple-C.R.U.D. Project
tagline: A C.R.U.D. Project using Maven Project + SPRING Framework + ObjectDB backend
body: ## About my Project :star2: This is a simple to intermediate sample of Create,Retrieve,Update and Delete (C.R.U.D) operations using JAVA programming language where it is powered by [Maven Project](http://maven.apache.org/#) ,[Spring Framework](https://projects.spring.io/spring-framework/) and [ObjectDB](http://www.objectdb.com/) as back-end. This project is also have basic security like avoiding POST_BACK bugs. This project also is a web application which is using a Web Framework [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/), which composed of Updated web technologies such as HTML 5,CSS 3,JavaScript/JQuery. ## :point_right: Requirements * Java JDK 6.0 (Preferrable) or Above * NetBeans (Java or All bundle) or Preffered IDE. * GlassFish Web Server (Other Web Server not no yet supported). * Preferably Chorme and Mozilla browsers. My project doesn't support IE. ##:point_right: Installation * Download the Project in my [Repo](https://github.com/clydegold8/Simple-MAVEN-SPRING-OBJECTDB-CRUD/archive/master.zip). * Save to your desire path or location and Extract the Project. * Open my Project with your Preffered IDE. * Feel Free to Test my Project. :+1:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
